SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.nimsoft.nimbus
Class NimLog

java.lang.Object
  com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimLog

public class NimLog
extends Object

The log class emulates the 'C' version in layout.

The class may also be used as a frontend for log4j. The method setLog4j(boolean) turns this option on / off. When the option is turned on the NimLog log levels are converted into log4j levels:

0 - fatal, 1 - error, 2 - warn, 3 - info, 4 - debug, 5 - debug,,,

close

logStackTrace

public void logStackTrace(int level,
                          Throwable t)
Log the stack trace of the given Throwable if the level is high enough. If number of bytes in file > MAX_LENGTH allowed, the content is saved in "_" + filename and the log file is truncated. If the filename is "stdout" and the log level is 10 or greater, no file truncation takes place. If log4j is set (setLog4j(true)) the log info is also logged to log4j.

Parameters:
level - The log level
t - The throwable whose stack trace will be logged

log

public void log(int loglevel,
                String text)
Log a text string in the "standard" format if the loglevel is high enough. If number of bytes in file > MAX_LENGTH allowed, the content is saved in "_" + filename and the logfile is truncated. If the filename is "stdout" and the loglevel is 10 or greater, no file truncation takes place. If log4j is set (setLog4j(true)) the log info is also logged to log4j.

Parameters:
loglevel - The log level
text - The text to be logged

log

public void log(int loglevel,
                PDS pds)
Log a PDS in the "standard" format if the log level is high enough. If number of bytes in file > MAX_LENGTH allowed, the content is saved in "_" + filename and the log file is truncated. If the filename is "stdout" and the log level is 10 or greater, no file truncation takes place. If log4j is set (setLog4j(true)) the log info is also logged to log4j.

Parameters:
loglevel - The log level
pds - The pds to be logged

log

public void log(int loglevel,
                PDS pds,
                boolean multiline)
Log a PDS in the "standard multiple line" format if the log level is high enough. If number of bytes in file > MAX_LENGTH allowed, the content is saved in "_" + filename and the log file is truncated. If the filename is "stdout" and the log level is 10 or greater, no file truncation takes place. If log4j is set (setLog4j(true)) the log info is also logged to log4j

Parameters:
loglevel - The log level
pds - The pds to be logged
multiline - True if multiple line

log

public void log(int loglevel,
                String text,
                PDS pds)
Log a text with an additional PDS in the "standard" format if the log level is high enough. If number of bytes in file > MAX_LENGTH allowed, the content is saved in "_" + filename and the log file is truncated. If the filename is "stdout" and the log level is 10 or greater, no file truncation takes place. If log4j is set (setLog4j(true)) the log info is also logged to log4j

Parameters:
loglevel - The log level
text - The text to be logged
pds - The pds to be logged

log

public void log(int loglevel,
                String text,
                PDS pds,
                boolean multiline)
Log a text with an additional PDS in the "standard multiline" format if the loglevel is high enough. If number of bytes in file > MAX_LENGTH allowed, the content is saved in "_" + filename and the logfile is truncated. If the filename is "stdout" and the loglevel is 10 or greater, no file truncation takes place. If log4j is set (setLog4j(true)) the log info is also logged to log4j

Parameters:
loglevel - The log level
text - The text to be logged
pds - The pds to be logged
multiline - True if multiline

                   String text,

logAlways

public void logAlways(int loglevel,
                      String text)
Log always a text string in the "standard" format regardless of the log level. If number of bytes in file > MAX_LENGTH allowed, the content is saved in "_" + filename and the log file is truncated. If the filename is "stdout" and the log level is 10 or greater, no file truncation takes place. If log4j is set (setLog4j(true)) the log info is also logged to log4j

Parameters:
loglevel - The log level (only as information)
text - The text to be logged

basicLog

                        String text)

Parameters:
text - The text to be logged
